concept.title: Privacy, Security, and Governance
concept.shortdesc: The intention of privacy, security, and governance is to protect informaton and ensure rightful access.

conbody.p: Privacy, security, and governance are not all the same thing.

ul.li: Privacy is maintaining rightful access to data, so that only those users who should access data are able to.
Security is the means by which privacy is maintained.

conbody.p: PHEMI Central manages crucial aspects of privacy and security such as data encryption, audit logs, and data validation. Privacy and security are designed in from the ground up to be able to accurately reflect your organizationâ€™s governance policies.
